	function createMetaTag(name, content)
	{
		var dtmMetaTag = document.createElement('meta');
		dtmMetaTag.setAttribute('id', name);
		dtmMetaTag.setAttribute('name', name);
		dtmMetaTag.setAttribute('content', content);
		document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(dtmMetaTag);
	}
	
		
	
	createMetaTag('dtmDeviceType', 'Desktop');
	createMetaTag('dtmDomain', 'en-ca');
	createMetaTag('dtmCurrency', 'CAD');
	
    createMetaTag('customerType', '');
    createMetaTag('s.eVar15', fingerprint);

	
		createMetaTag('dtmProductDetailPageName', 'Olive Exfoliating Cream Body Scrub | The Body Shop&reg;');
		createMetaTag('dtmProductDetailProductCode', 'p000010');
		createMetaTag('dtmProductDetailProductName', 'Olive Exfoliating Cream Body Scrub');
		createMetaTag('dtmProductDetailProductUrl', 'https://www.thebodyshop.com/en-ca/body/body-scrub-polish/olive-exfoliating-cream-body-scrub/p/p000010');
		
		
			createMetaTag('dtmProductDetailProductImageUrl', 'https://assets.thebodyshop.com/medias/olive-exfoliating-cream-body-scrub-1-640x640.jpg?context=product-images/h50/h63/8796528050206/olive-exfoliating-cream-body-scrub_1-640x640.jpg');

<!--tag-variables START-->
	function createMetaTagForTagVariables(name, content)
	{
		var tvMetaTag = document.createElement('meta');
		tvMetaTag.setAttribute('id', name);
		tvMetaTag.setAttribute('name', name);
		tvMetaTag.setAttribute('content', content);
		document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(tvMetaTag);
	}
	
	<!--tag-variables END-->
</script>

	<!-- Begin Monetate ExpressTag Async v6. Place at start of document head. DO NOT ALTER. -->
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var monetateT = new Date().getTime();
	    (function() {

		    var p = document.location.protocol;
		    if (p == "http:" || p == "https:") {
			    var m = document.createElement('script');
			    m.type = 'text/javascript';
			    m.async = true;
			    m.src = (p == "https:" ? "https://s" : "http://") + "b.monetate.net/js/1/a-8b4032a4/p/en-ca.thebodyshop.com/" + Math.floor((monetateT + 508205) / 3600000) + "/g";
			    var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
			    s.parentNode.insertBefore(m, s);
		    }
	    })();
	</script>

<!--  Tracking Code -->
<script type="text/javascript">
	var monetateMediatorMembers = {};
    var monetateMediator = window.monetateMediator = {};

    var searchedProducts=[];
    var atLeastOneSearch=false;


    var productDetails=null;
    var categoryName=null;


    monetateMediator.subscribe = function(eventId, functionMemeber) {

	    monetateMediatorMembers[eventId] = functionMemeber;
    }
    monetateMediator.publish = function(eventId, data) {

	    if (monetateMediatorMembers[eventId]) {
		    monetateMediatorMembers[eventId](data);
	    }
    }
    monetateMediator.subscribe('trackAddToCart', function(data) {

	    if (data.cartData) {
		    trackAddToCart_monetate(data.cartData);
	    }
    });
    monetateMediator.subscribe('searchedProducts', function(productsMonetate) {

	    if (productsMonetate) {

	        searchedProducts=productsMonetate;
	        atLeastOneSearch=true;
           	window.monetateQ.push([ "addProducts", productsMonetate ]);
		    window.monetateQ.push([ "addBreadcrumbs", breadcrumbName ]);
		    window.monetateQ.push([ "setPageType", currentPageType.toLowerCase() ]);


            if(CartProducts && CartProducts.length>0)
            {
                window.monetateQ.push([ "addCartRows", CartProducts ]);
                if(productDetails)
                {
                    window.monetateQ.push([ "addProductDetails", productDetails ]);
                }
                if(categoryName)
                {
                    window.monetateQ.push([ "addCategories", categoryName ]);
                }

            }

		    window.monetateQ.push([ "trackData" ]);
	    }
    });
    
    window.monetateQ = window.monetateQ || [];
    var path = location.pathname;
    var currentPageType = "unknown";
    if (path.indexOf("login") != -1) {
	    currentPageType = "login";
    } else if (path.indexOf("my-account") != -1) {
	    currentPageType = "account";
    } else if (path.indexOf("checkout") != -1 && path.indexOf("orderConfirmation") == -1) {
	    currentPageType = "checkout";
    } else if (path.indexOf("orderConfirmation") != -1) {
	    currentPageType = "purchase";
    }
    
    
    	currentPageType = "PRODUCT";
    
    
    window.monetateQ.push([ "setPageType", currentPageType.toLowerCase() ]);
    
    	window.monetateQ.push([ "addProductDetails", [ "p000010" ] ]);
    	var categoryName = [];
    	
    		categoryName.push("Body Scrub & Polish");
    	
   		window.monetateQ.push([ "addCategories", categoryName ]);
    
    
    var CartProducts = [];
    
    
    function trackAddToCart_monetate(cartData) {

	    if (cartData.resetCart) {
		    window.monetateQ = window.monetateQ || [];
		    window.monetateQ.push([ "addCartRows", [] ]);
		    CartProducts=[];
		    return;
	    }
	    window.monetateQ.push([ "setPageType", currentPageType.toLowerCase() ]);
	    window.monetateQ.push([ "addProductDetails", cartData.productDetails ]);
	    window.monetateQ.push([ "addCategories", cartData.categoryName ]);
	    if(atLeastOneSearch && searchedProducts)
	    {
	       window.monetateQ.push([ "addProducts", searchedProducts ]);
	    }
	    if(breadcrumbName)
	    {
	      window.monetateQ.push([ "addBreadcrumbs", breadcrumbName ]);
	    }


	    var changedItem = cartData.cartProductDetail[0];
	    var found = false;
	    if (CartProducts && CartProducts.length > 0) {
		    var i = 0;
		    for (i = 0; i < CartProducts.length; i++) {
			    if (CartProducts[i].productId == changedItem.productId) {
				    CartProducts[i].quantity = parseInt(CartProducts[i].quantity) + parseInt(changedItem.quantity);
				    found = true;
				    if (CartProducts[i].quantity == 0) {
					    CartProducts.pop(i);
				    }
				    break;
			    }
		    }
	    } else {
		    CartProducts = [];
	    }
	    if (!found) {
		    CartProducts.push(changedItem);
	    }
	    cartData.cartDetails = CartProducts;
	    window.monetateQ.push([ "addCartRows", cartData.cartDetails ]);
	    window.monetateQ.push([ "trackData" ]);

        productDetails=cartData.productDetails;
        categoryName=cartData.categoryName;
    };



    
    	var breadcrumbName = [];
    	
    		breadcrumbName.push("Body");
    	
    		breadcrumbName.push("Body Scrub & Polish");
    	
    		breadcrumbName.push("Olive Exfoliating Cream Body Scrub");
    	
              window.monetateQ.push([ "addBreadcrumbs", breadcrumbName ]);
        
        	window.monetateQ.push([ "trackData" ]);
    </script><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">

		<h4 class="signup-title">
			Sign up to our newsletter</h4>
		<p class="signup-info">
			Enter your email for occasional updates and to be the first to hear about our exclusive offers and events.</p>
        <div class="error-container" ng-show="newsletterSignup.errors.askLogin">
            <small class="error">This email is already in use. Please login if you want to change your communication preferences.</small>
        </div>
        <form name="newsletter2" ng-validator novalidate>
			<label for="newsletter-firstname">
				First Name</label>
			<input type="text" name="name" ng-model="newsletter2.firstname" id="newsletter-firstname" ng-pattern="/^.{1,50}$/" ng-class="{'tbs-invalid': newsletterSignup.errors.firstname > ''}" required>
			<div class="error-container" ng-show="newsletter2.name.$invalid && newsletter2.name.$dirty">
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletter2.name.$error.required">
					This field is required</small>
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletter2.name.$error.pattern">
					This field is too long (maximum is 50 characters)</small>
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletterSignup.errors.firstname > ''">{{newsletterSignup.errors.firstname}}</small>
			</div>
			<label for="newsletter-lastname">
				Surname</label>
			<input type="text" name="surname" ng-model="newsletter2.lastname"  ng-pattern="/^.{1,50}$/" id="newsletter-lastname" value="" ng-class="{'tbs-invalid': newsletterSignup.errors.lastname > ''}" required>
			<div class="error-container" ng-show="newsletter2.surname.$invalid && newsletter2.surname.$dirty || newsletterSignup.errors.lastname > ''">
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletter2.surname.$error.required">
					This field is required</small>
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletter2.surname.$error.pattern">
					This field is too long (maximum is 50 characters)</small>
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletterSignup.errors.lastname > ''">{{newsletterSignup.errors.lastname}}</small>
			</div>
			<label for="newsletter-email">
				Email Address</label>

            <input type="text" name="emailaddress" ng-trim="false" ng-readonly="!newsletterSignup.isGuest"  ng-pattern="/^[_A-Za-z0-9-\+!#$%&\u0027*\/=?^_~{|}`]+(\.[_A-Za-z0-9-\+!#$%&\u0027*\/=?^_~{|}`]+)*@[A-Za-z0-9-]+(\.[A-Za-z0-9]+)*(\.[A-Za-z]{2,})$/" ng-model="newsletter2email" value="" ng-class="{'tbs-invalid': newsletterSignup.errors.email > ''}" id="newsletter-email" required>
			<div class="error-container" ng-show="newsletter2.emailaddress.$invalid && newsletter2.emailaddress.$dirty || newsletterSignup.errors.email > ''">
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletter2.emailaddress.$error.required">
					This field is required</small>
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletter2.emailaddress.$error.pattern">
					Please enter a valid email</small>
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletterSignup.errors.email > ''">{{newsletterSignup.errors.email}}</small>
			</div>
			<div class="checkbox-row" ng-class="{'has-error': newsletterSignup.agreeIsInvalid() }" tbs-custom-checkbox data-focus-label=".checkbox-signup-label">
				<div class="checkbox-wrapper">
					<input id="newsletter-terms" type="checkbox" name="termsandconditions" value="1" ng-model="newsletter2.agree" value="" ng-required="!fnewsletter.agree" required>
					<label ng-click="newsletter2.agree = !newsletter2.agree" />
					</label>
				</div>
				<label class="checkbox-signup-label" tabindex="0" for="newsletter-terms">
					<span class="checkbox-info">
						By ticking this box you agree to our <a href="https://www.thebodyshop.com/en-ca/policies/terms-and-conditions" target="_blank">Terms and Conditions</a></span>
				</label>
			</div>
			<div class="error-container" ng-show="newsletterSignup.agreeIsInvalid()">
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletter2.agree.$error.required">
					This field is required</small>
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletterSignup.errors.agree > ''">{{newsletterSignup.errors.agree}}</small>
			</div>
			<input ng-class="{disabled: newsletter2.$invalid}" ng-disabled="disableSubmitNewsletter" type="submit" name="submit" class="btn-secondary" value="Sign up" ng-click="newsletterSignup.submit(newsletter2.$valid);disableSubmitNewsletter=true" ng-dblclick="return">
			<div class="newsletter-policy"><p></p></div>
		</form>
	</div>

							ng-keyup="autocom.selectResultDesktop($event)"
							placeholder="" autofocus="autofocus"
							_lpchecked="1"> <a href="#"
							ng-click="autocom.clearInput()"> <img class="svg"
							src="https://assets.thebodyshop.com/_ui/responsive/theme-tbs/assets/svg/icon-close.svg"
							alt="clear">
						</a>
					</div>
					<ul class="input-autocomplete">
						<li class="dsktp-autocom-li"
							ng-class="{'selected': autocom.isSelected($index)}"
							ng-repeat="prod in autocom.filteredProducts | limitTo:7 track by $index ">
							<a ng-click="autocom.setSelectedDesktop($event, $index)" href="#"
							ng-bind-html="prod | highlight:autocom.searchText"></a>
						</li>
					</ul>
				</form>
			</div>
            </div>

				<li class="menu-item"><div ng-controller="newsletterSignup">
									<div id="newsletter-popup2" class="mfp-hide newsletter-popup popup tbs-form">
	<div id="newsletter-signup-form" ng-show="newsletterSignup.showForm">
		<h4 class="signup-title">
			Sign up to our newsletter</h4>
		<p class="signup-info">
			Enter your email for occasional updates and to be the first to hear about our exclusive offers and events.</p>
        <div class="error-container" ng-show="newsletterSignup.errors.askLogin">
            <small class="error">This email is already in use. Please login if you want to change your communication preferences.</small>
        </div>
        <form name="newsletter2" ng-validator novalidate>
			<label for="newsletter-firstname">
				First Name</label>
			<input type="text" name="name" ng-model="newsletter2.firstname" id="newsletter-firstname" ng-pattern="/^.{1,50}$/" ng-class="{'tbs-invalid': newsletterSignup.errors.firstname > ''}" required>
			<div class="error-container" ng-show="newsletter2.name.$invalid && newsletter2.name.$dirty">
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletter2.name.$error.required">
					This field is required</small>
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletter2.name.$error.pattern">
					This field is too long (maximum is 50 characters)</small>
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletterSignup.errors.firstname > ''">{{newsletterSignup.errors.firstname}}</small>
			</div>
			<label for="newsletter-lastname">
				Surname</label>
			<input type="text" name="surname" ng-model="newsletter2.lastname"  ng-pattern="/^.{1,50}$/" id="newsletter-lastname" value="" ng-class="{'tbs-invalid': newsletterSignup.errors.lastname > ''}" required>
			<div class="error-container" ng-show="newsletter2.surname.$invalid && newsletter2.surname.$dirty || newsletterSignup.errors.lastname > ''">
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletter2.surname.$error.required">
					This field is required</small>
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletter2.surname.$error.pattern">
					This field is too long (maximum is 50 characters)</small>
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletterSignup.errors.lastname > ''">{{newsletterSignup.errors.lastname}}</small>
			</div>
			<label for="newsletter-email">
				Email Address</label>

            <input type="text" name="emailaddress" ng-trim="false" ng-readonly="!newsletterSignup.isGuest"  ng-pattern="/^[_A-Za-z0-9-\+!#$%&\u0027*\/=?^_~{|}`]+(\.[_A-Za-z0-9-\+!#$%&\u0027*\/=?^_~{|}`]+)*@[A-Za-z0-9-]+(\.[A-Za-z0-9]+)*(\.[A-Za-z]{2,})$/" ng-model="newsletter2email" value="" ng-class="{'tbs-invalid': newsletterSignup.errors.email > ''}" id="newsletter-email" required>
			<div class="error-container" ng-show="newsletter2.emailaddress.$invalid && newsletter2.emailaddress.$dirty || newsletterSignup.errors.email > ''">
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletter2.emailaddress.$error.required">
					This field is required</small>
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletter2.emailaddress.$error.pattern">
					Please enter a valid email</small>
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletterSignup.errors.email > ''">{{newsletterSignup.errors.email}}</small>
			</div>
			<div class="checkbox-row" ng-class="{'has-error': newsletterSignup.agreeIsInvalid() }" tbs-custom-checkbox data-focus-label=".checkbox-signup-label">
				<div class="checkbox-wrapper">
					<input id="newsletter-terms" type="checkbox" name="termsandconditions" value="1" ng-model="newsletter2.agree" value="" ng-required="!fnewsletter.agree" required>
					<label ng-click="newsletter2.agree = !newsletter2.agree" />
					</label>
				</div>
				<label class="checkbox-signup-label" tabindex="0" for="newsletter-terms">
					<span class="checkbox-info">
						By ticking this box you agree to our <a href="https://www.thebodyshop.com/en-ca/policies/terms-and-conditions" target="_blank">Terms and Conditions</a></span>
				</label>
			</div>
			<div class="error-container" ng-show="newsletterSignup.agreeIsInvalid()">
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletter2.agree.$error.required">
					This field is required</small>
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletterSignup.errors.agree > ''">{{newsletterSignup.errors.agree}}</small>
			</div>
			<input ng-class="{disabled: newsletter2.$invalid}" ng-disabled="disableSubmitNewsletter" type="submit" name="submit" class="btn-secondary" value="Sign up" ng-click="newsletterSignup.submit(newsletter2.$valid);disableSubmitNewsletter=true" ng-dblclick="return">
			<div class="newsletter-policy"><p></p></div>
		</form>
	</div>
	<div id="newsletter-signup-result" ng-show="newsletterSignup.showPopup">
		<p>
			Thank you! You have been signed up for our newsletter.</p>
	</div>

		<script type="text/javascript">

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {

        var articleIds = [
            
                    'product-reviews',
                    'product-QnA',
                    'section-ingredients',
                    'section-how-to-use',
                    'section-delivery',
                    'section-best-with',
                    'recommended-products'
        ];

        articleIds.forEach(function (articleId) {
            if ('' != articleId) {
                var article = document.getElementById(articleId);
                if (!article) {
                    var buttonOfTheArticle = document.getElementById("quicklink-li-" + articleId);
                    buttonOfTheArticle.parentNode.removeChild(buttonOfTheArticle);
                }
            }
        });
    });

</script>

			<article id='product-reviews' class="accordion-section" tbs-product-accordion="" section="reviewSection">
    <header class="accordion-header reviews arrow-toggle ng-click-active" tabindex="0" aria-label="" ng-click="accordion.toggle('reviewSection')" style="">
    			<h2 class="accordion-heading">
    				Reviews</h2>
    			<h3 class="accordion-subheading">
    				We&rsquo;d love to hear what you think of our products</h3>
    </header>

    <div id='BVRRContainer' class="accordion-section-body" style="">
        <!--begin-bvseo-reviews-->

<!--begin-aggregate-rating-->
<div id="bvseo-aggregateRatingSection" itemprop="aggregateRating" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating">
    <span class="bvseo-itemReviewed" itemprop="itemReviewed">Olive Exfoliating Cream Body Scrub</span> is rated
    <span class="bvseo-ratingValue" itemprop="ratingValue">4.7</span> out of
    <span class="bvseo-bestRating" itemprop="bestRating">5</span> by
    <span class="bvseo-reviewCount" itemprop="reviewCount">18</span>.
</div>
<!--end-aggregate-rating-->

<!--begin-reviews-->
<div id="bvseo-reviewsSection">
    <div class="bvseo-review" itemprop="review" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" data-reviewid="160156504">
        <meta itemprop="itemReviewed" content="Olive Exfoliating Cream Body Scrub" />
        <span itemprop="reviewRating" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating">
            Rated <span itemprop="ratingValue">5</span> out of
            <span itemprop="bestRating">5</span>
        </span> by
        <span itemprop="author">Prissy</span> from
        <span itemprop="name">Love this Scrub</span>
        <span itemprop="description">I first tried the shea body scrub and when I went back to buy more I noticed the travel size Olive scrub. I looked at and felt the texture and thought it felt and smelled good so I bought to try. I really like this scrub. It is creamy but exfoliates really well and my skin feels very smooth afterwards. I like the fresh scent and there's no oily residue left on skin like the shea body scrub. Before I finished my bottle I bought a second one.</span>
        <div class="bvseo-pubdate">Date published: 2017-04-30</div>
        <meta itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-04-30" />
    </div>
    <div class="bvseo-review" itemprop="review" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" data-reviewid="150653174">
        <meta itemprop="itemReviewed" content="Olive Exfoliating Cream Body Scrub" />
        <span itemprop="reviewRating" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating">
            Rated <span itemprop="ratingValue">4</span> out of
            <span itemprop="bestRating">5</span>
        </span> by
        <span itemprop="author">mandabear</span> from
        <span itemprop="name">I really enjoyed this!</span>
        <span itemprop="description">LOVED how it left my skin feeling so smooth and fresh. Really did a great job at exfoliating. However, you pay a lot for something that is gone in about two weeks, I recommend that the Body Shop make this in a bigger size for the same price or make the formula thicker.</span>
        <div class="bvseo-pubdate">Date published: 2017-02-12</div>
        <meta itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-02-12" />
    </div>

											<div class="tabpanel-text-wrapper">
												<h3 class="tabpanel-title" style="color:#FFFFFF">Olive</h3>
												<p class="tabpanel-text" style="color:#FFFFFF">The benefits of olive oil have been heralded since the times of Homer, undisputed until today. Olive oil restores the skins smoothness, has anti-aging properties and protects against ultraviolet light. The vitamins and antioxidants in olive oil help to soothe, relieve and repair dry, chapped, itchy skin by rebuilding the skin's moisture. Our organic olive oil is of the finest quality, from the rolling hills of San Mauro Cilento. Get the fresh, healthy glow of olive skin, straight from Italy.</p>
												<div class="tabpanel-link-wrapper">
													<a style="color:#FFFFFF" href="/en-ca/ingredient/olive-oil" class="link-cta ">Discover More</a>
												</div>
											</div>
										</div>
							</div>

											All Ingredients</h3>
										<p class="tabpanel-text ng-hide" ng-show="product.isVariantActive(0)">Aqua (Water) (Solvent/Diluent), Olea europaea (Olive Oil) (Emollient), Oryza sativa (Rice) (Exfoliant), Cetearyl Alcohol (Emulsifier), Juglans regia (Walnut Shell Powder) (Exfoliant), Dimethicone (Skin Conditioning Agent), Sorbitan Stearate (Emulsifier), Glyceryl Stearate (Emulsifier), PEG-100 Stearate (Surfactant), Benzyl Alcohol (Preservative), Carbomer (Stabiliser/Viscosity Modifier), Phenoxyethanol (Preservative), Xanthan Gum (Viscosity Modifier), Helianthus annuus (Sunflower Seed Oil) (Emollient), Methylparaben (Preservative), Silica (Absorbent), Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Hydroxide (pH Adjuster), Propylparaben (Preservative), Isopropyl Myristate (Emollient), Butylphenyl Methylpropional (Fragrance Ingredient), Linalool (Fragrance Ingredient), Disodium EDTA (Chelating Agent), Hexyl Cinnamal (Fragrance Ingredient), Daucus carota (Carrot Extract) (Natural Additive), Citronellol (Fragrance Ingredient), Beta-Carotene (Colorant), Citral (Fragrance Ingredient), Limonene (Fragrance Ingredient), Tocopherol (Antioxidant), Geraniol (Fragrance Ingredient), Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone (Fragrance Ingredient), Caramel (Colour), CI 77288 (Colour).</p>
											<p class="tabpanel-text ng-hide" ng-show="product.isVariantActive(1)">Aqua (Water) (Solvent/Diluent), Olea europaea (Olive Oil) (Emollient), Oryza sativa (Rice) (Exfoliant), Cetearyl Alcohol (Emulsifier), Juglans regia (Walnut Shell Powder) (Exfoliant), Dimethicone (Skin Conditioning Agent), Sorbitan Stearate (Emulsifier), Glyceryl Stearate (Emulsifier), PEG-100 Stearate (Surfactant), Benzyl Alcohol (Preservative), Carbomer (Stabiliser/Viscosity Modifier), Phenoxyethanol (Preservative), Xanthan Gum (Viscosity Modifier), Helianthus annuus (Sunflower Seed Oil) (Emollient), Methylparaben (Preservative), Silica (Absorbent), Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Hydroxide (pH Adjuster), Propylparaben (Preservative), Isopropyl Myristate (Emollient), Butylphenyl Methylpropional (Fragrance Ingredient), Linalool (Fragrance Ingredient), Disodium EDTA (Chelating Agent), Hexyl Cinnamal (Fragrance Ingredient), Daucus carota (Carrot Extract) (Natural Additive), Citronellol (Fragrance Ingredient), Beta-Carotene (Colorant), Citral (Fragrance Ingredient), Limonene (Fragrance Ingredient), Tocopherol (Antioxidant), Geraniol (Fragrance Ingredient), Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone (Fragrance Ingredient), Caramel (Colour), CI 77288 (Colour).</p>

<article class='accordion-section' id='section-delivery' tbs-product-accordion section='delivery'><header role='group' class='accordion-header arrow-toggle' tabindex='0' ng-click=accordion.toggle('delivery')><h2 class='accordion-heading'>Delivery &amp; returns</h2><h3 class='accordion-subheading'>For You</h3></header><div class='accordion-section-body delivery'><div class='delivery-wrapper'><ul class='delivery-list three-col' role='group'><li  role='group'><div class='delivery-icon-wrapper'><img class='icon svg standard-delivery' src='/_ui/responsive/theme-tbs/assets/svg/icon-delivery-truck.svg' alt='Standard delivery'/></div><h4 class='delivery-header'>Standard Delivery</h4><p class='delivery-price'><!--FREE SHIPPING!* Limited Time Only. *Terms apply.-->$7.95 (FREE Shipping with $75 Purchase)</p><p class='delivery-info'>Delivery time is up to 7 business days from order date. 	<h2 class="main-heading">Enrich Not Exploit</h2>
	<h3 class="sub-heading"></h3>
</header>
<div class="promo-product enrich-not-exploit" ng-cloak>
	<div class="container image">
		<picture> <!--[if IE 9]><video style="display: none;"><![endif]-->
		<source srcset="https://assets.thebodyshop.com/medias/enrich-not-exploit-640.jpg?context=content-images/hd0/h76/8796378005534/enrich-not-exploit_640.jpg" media="(min-width: 1024px)">
		<source srcset="https://assets.thebodyshop.com/medias/enrich-not-exploit-640.jpg?context=content-images/hd0/h76/8796378005534/enrich-not-exploit_640.jpg" media="(min-width: 641px) and (max-width: 1024px)">

	</div>
	<div class="container info">
		<div class="info-inner">
			<h2 class="info-header">It's in our hands</h2>
			<p class="info-copy">Our story started with Anita Roddick's belief in something revolutionary; that business could be a force for good, and in 1976 The Body Shop was born. We've always done things differently, broken the mould, been bold, been brave.
Today, our commitment is stronger than ever; to enrich, not exploit. For us, this means enriching people as well as our planet, its biodiversity and resources. We are committed to working fairly with our farmers and suppliers and helping communities to thrive. Our products enrich, but never make false promises and are never tested on animals. We are proud to be original, irreverent and campaign for what’s right; together we can do it.</p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

			var name = cookieName + "=";
			var cookies = document.cookie.split(";");
		    for(var i=0; i<cookies.length; i++) {
		        var cookie = cookies[i];
		        while (cookie.charAt(0)==' ') cookie = cookie.substring(1);
		        if (cookie.indexOf(name) == 0) return cookie.substring(name.length,cookie.length);
		    }
		    return "";
		};

		HYB.cookies.updateCookie = function(cookieName, cookieValue, cookieMaxAge, cookiePath) {
			var expireDate = new Date();
			expireDate.setTime(expireDate.getTime() + (cookieMaxAge*1000));
			document.cookie = cookieName + "=" + cookieValue + "; expires=" + expireDate.toUTCString() + "; path=" + cookiePath;
		};

	function createMetaTag(name, content)
	{
		var dtmMetaTag = document.createElement('meta');
		dtmMetaTag.setAttribute('id', name);
		dtmMetaTag.setAttribute('name', name);
		dtmMetaTag.setAttribute('content', content);
		document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(dtmMetaTag);
	}
	
		
	
	createMetaTag('dtmDeviceType', 'Desktop');

	function createMetaTagForTagVariables(name, content)
	{
		var tvMetaTag = document.createElement('meta');

			    m.type = 'text/javascript';
			    m.async = true;
			    m.src = (p == "https:" ? "https://s" : "http://") + "b.monetate.net/js/1/a-8b4032a4/p/en-ca.thebodyshop.com/" + Math.floor((monetateT + 508205) / 3600000) + "/g";
			    var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
			    s.parentNode.insertBefore(m, s);
		    }
	    })();
	</script>
	<!-- End Monetate tag. -->

<!--  Tracking Code -->
<script type="text/javascript">
	var monetateMediatorMembers = {};
    var monetateMediator = window.monetateMediator = {};

    var searchedProducts=[];
    var atLeastOneSearch=false;


    var productDetails=null;
    var categoryName=null;


    monetateMediator.subscribe = function(eventId, functionMemeber) {

	    monetateMediatorMembers[eventId] = functionMemeber;
    }
    monetateMediator.publish = function(eventId, data) {

	    if (monetateMediatorMembers[eventId]) {
		    monetateMediatorMembers[eventId](data);
	    }
    }
    monetateMediator.subscribe('trackAddToCart', function(data) {

	    if (data.cartData) {
		    trackAddToCart_monetate(data.cartData);
	    }
    });
    monetateMediator.subscribe('searchedProducts', function(productsMonetate) {

	    if (productsMonetate) {

	        searchedProducts=productsMonetate;
	        atLeastOneSearch=true;
           	window.monetateQ.push([ "addProducts", productsMonetate ]);
		    window.monetateQ.push([ "addBreadcrumbs", breadcrumbName ]);
		    window.monetateQ.push([ "setPageType", currentPageType.toLowerCase() ]);


            if(CartProducts && CartProducts.length>0)
            {
                window.monetateQ.push([ "addCartRows", CartProducts ]);
                if(productDetails)
                {
                    window.monetateQ.push([ "addProductDetails", productDetails ]);
                }
                if(categoryName)
                {
                    window.monetateQ.push([ "addCategories", categoryName ]);
                }

            }

		    window.monetateQ.push([ "trackData" ]);
	    }
    });
    
    window.monetateQ = window.monetateQ || [];
    var path = location.pathname;
    var currentPageType = "unknown";
    if (path.indexOf("login") != -1) {
	    currentPageType = "login";
    } else if (path.indexOf("my-account") != -1) {
	    currentPageType = "account";
    } else if (path.indexOf("checkout") != -1 && path.indexOf("orderConfirmation") == -1) {
	    currentPageType = "checkout";
    } else if (path.indexOf("orderConfirmation") != -1) {
	    currentPageType = "purchase";
    }
    
    
    	currentPageType = "PRODUCT";
    
    
    window.monetateQ.push([ "setPageType", currentPageType.toLowerCase() ]);
    
    	window.monetateQ.push([ "addProductDetails", [ "p000010" ] ]);
    	var categoryName = [];
    	
    		categoryName.push("Body Scrub & Polish");
    	
   		window.monetateQ.push([ "addCategories", categoryName ]);
    
    
    var CartProducts = [];
    
    
    function trackAddToCart_monetate(cartData) {

	    if (cartData.resetCart) {
		    window.monetateQ = window.monetateQ || [];
		    window.monetateQ.push([ "addCartRows", [] ]);
		    CartProducts=[];
		    return;
	    }
	    window.monetateQ.push([ "setPageType", currentPageType.toLowerCase() ]);
	    window.monetateQ.push([ "addProductDetails", cartData.productDetails ]);
	    window.monetateQ.push([ "addCategories", cartData.categoryName ]);
	    if(atLeastOneSearch && searchedProducts)
	    {
	       window.monetateQ.push([ "addProducts", searchedProducts ]);
	    }
	    if(breadcrumbName)
	    {
	      window.monetateQ.push([ "addBreadcrumbs", breadcrumbName ]);
	    }


	    var changedItem = cartData.cartProductDetail[0];
	    var found = false;
	    if (CartProducts && CartProducts.length > 0) {
		    var i = 0;
		    for (i = 0; i < CartProducts.length; i++) {
			    if (CartProducts[i].productId == changedItem.productId) {
				    CartProducts[i].quantity = parseInt(CartProducts[i].quantity) + parseInt(changedItem.quantity);
				    found = true;
				    if (CartProducts[i].quantity == 0) {
					    CartProducts.pop(i);
				    }
				    break;
			    }
		    }
	    } else {
		    CartProducts = [];
	    }
	    if (!found) {
		    CartProducts.push(changedItem);
	    }
	    cartData.cartDetails = CartProducts;
	    window.monetateQ.push([ "addCartRows", cartData.cartDetails ]);
	    window.monetateQ.push([ "trackData" ]);

        productDetails=cartData.productDetails;
        categoryName=cartData.categoryName;
    };



    
    	var breadcrumbName = [];
    	
    		breadcrumbName.push("Body");
    	
    		breadcrumbName.push("Body Scrub & Polish");
    	
    		breadcrumbName.push("Olive Exfoliating Cream Body Scrub");
    	
              window.monetateQ.push([ "addBreadcrumbs", breadcrumbName ]);
        
        	window.monetateQ.push([ "trackData" ]);
    </script><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">

    <link rel="canonical" href="https://www.thebodyshop.com/en-ca/body/body-scrub-polish/olive-exfoliating-cream-body-scrub/p/p000010" />
	</head>

		ng-mouseleave="navigation.processMouseLeave($event)">

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {

        var articleIds = [
            
                    'product-reviews',
                    'product-QnA',
                    'section-ingredients',
                    'section-how-to-use',
                    'section-delivery',
                    'section-best-with',
                    'recommended-products'
        ];

        articleIds.forEach(function (articleId) {
            if ('' != articleId) {
                var article = document.getElementById(articleId);
                if (!article) {
                    var buttonOfTheArticle = document.getElementById("quicklink-li-" + articleId);
                    buttonOfTheArticle.parentNode.removeChild(buttonOfTheArticle);
                }
            }
        });
    });

</script>

<article class="accordion-section ingredients-section" id="section-ingredients" tbs-product-accordion="" section="ingredients">

								<div class="ingredients-column ingredients-right-wrapper">
									<div class="tabpanel-img-wrapper">
										<picture> <!--[if IE 9]><video style="display: none;"><![endif]-->
										<source srcset="https://assets.thebodyshop.com/medias/en-global-interactive-map-olive-640x522.jpg?context=product-images/h5a/h19/8796366274590/en-global-interactive-map-olive-640x522.jpg" media="(min-width: 1025px)">
										<source srcset="https://assets.thebodyshop.com/medias/Single-Ingredient-Square-Olive-Oil-HR-500x500.jpg?context=product-images/h92/ha3/8796366012446/Single_Ingredient_Square_Olive_Oil_HR-500x500.jpg" media="(min-width: 641px)">
										<source srcset="https://assets.thebodyshop.com/medias/Single-Ingredient-Square-Olive-Oil-HR-640x640.jpg?context=product-images/he5/h18/8796365946910/Single_Ingredient_Square_Olive_Oil_HR-640x640.jpg" media="(max-width: 640px)">
										
										<!--[if IE 9]></video><![endif]--> <img class="tabpanel-img" src="https://assets.thebodyshop.com/medias/Single-Ingredient-Square-Olive-Oil-HR-640x640.jpg?context=product-images/he5/h18/8796365946910/Single_Ingredient_Square_Olive_Oil_HR-640x640.jpg" alt="Olive"> </picture>
									</div>
								</div>
								<div class=" ingredients-column ingredients-left-wrapper">
									<style type="text/css">
												.ingredient .link-cta {
													border-color: #FFFFFF
												;
												}
											</style>
											<div class="tabpanel-text-wrapper">
												<h3 class="tabpanel-title" style="color:#FFFFFF">Olive</h3>
												<p class="tabpanel-text" style="color:#FFFFFF">The benefits of olive oil have been heralded since the times of Homer, undisputed until today. Olive oil restores the skins smoothness, has anti-aging properties and protects against ultraviolet light. The vitamins and antioxidants in olive oil help to soothe, relieve and repair dry, chapped, itchy skin by rebuilding the skin's moisture. Our organic olive oil is of the finest quality, from the rolling hills of San Mauro Cilento. Get the fresh, healthy glow of olive skin, straight from Italy.</p>
												<div class="tabpanel-link-wrapper">
													<a style="color:#FFFFFF" href="/en-ca/ingredient/olive-oil" class="link-cta ">Discover More</a>
												</div>
											</div>
										</div>
							</div>
							<div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane ingredients-list" id="content1">
								<div class="ingredients-list-wrapper">
									<div class="tabpanel-text-wrapper">
										<h3 class="tabpanel-title">
											All Ingredients</h3>
										<p class="tabpanel-text ng-hide" ng-show="product.isVariantActive(0)">Aqua (Water) (Solvent/Diluent), Olea europaea (Olive Oil) (Emollient), Oryza sativa (Rice) (Exfoliant), Cetearyl Alcohol (Emulsifier), Juglans regia (Walnut Shell Powder) (Exfoliant), Dimethicone (Skin Conditioning Agent), Sorbitan Stearate (Emulsifier), Glyceryl Stearate (Emulsifier), PEG-100 Stearate (Surfactant), Benzyl Alcohol (Preservative), Carbomer (Stabiliser/Viscosity Modifier), Phenoxyethanol (Preservative), Xanthan Gum (Viscosity Modifier), Helianthus annuus (Sunflower Seed Oil) (Emollient), Methylparaben (Preservative), Silica (Absorbent), Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Hydroxide (pH Adjuster), Propylparaben (Preservative), Isopropyl Myristate (Emollient), Butylphenyl Methylpropional (Fragrance Ingredient), Linalool (Fragrance Ingredient), Disodium EDTA (Chelating Agent), Hexyl Cinnamal (Fragrance Ingredient), Daucus carota (Carrot Extract) (Natural Additive), Citronellol (Fragrance Ingredient), Beta-Carotene (Colorant), Citral (Fragrance Ingredient), Limonene (Fragrance Ingredient), Tocopherol (Antioxidant), Geraniol (Fragrance Ingredient), Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone (Fragrance Ingredient), Caramel (Colour), CI 77288 (Colour).</p>
											<p class="tabpanel-text ng-hide" ng-show="product.isVariantActive(1)">Aqua (Water) (Solvent/Diluent), Olea europaea (Olive Oil) (Emollient), Oryza sativa (Rice) (Exfoliant), Cetearyl Alcohol (Emulsifier), Juglans regia (Walnut Shell Powder) (Exfoliant), Dimethicone (Skin Conditioning Agent), Sorbitan Stearate (Emulsifier), Glyceryl Stearate (Emulsifier), PEG-100 Stearate (Surfactant), Benzyl Alcohol (Preservative), Carbomer (Stabiliser/Viscosity Modifier), Phenoxyethanol (Preservative), Xanthan Gum (Viscosity Modifier), Helianthus annuus (Sunflower Seed Oil) (Emollient), Methylparaben (Preservative), Silica (Absorbent), Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Hydroxide (pH Adjuster), Propylparaben (Preservative), Isopropyl Myristate (Emollient), Butylphenyl Methylpropional (Fragrance Ingredient), Linalool (Fragrance Ingredient), Disodium EDTA (Chelating Agent), Hexyl Cinnamal (Fragrance Ingredient), Daucus carota (Carrot Extract) (Natural Additive), Citronellol (Fragrance Ingredient), Beta-Carotene (Colorant), Citral (Fragrance Ingredient), Limonene (Fragrance Ingredient), Tocopherol (Antioxidant), Geraniol (Fragrance Ingredient), Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone (Fragrance Ingredient), Caramel (Colour), CI 77288 (Colour).</p>

		</header>

<article class='accordion-section' id='section-delivery' tbs-product-accordion section='delivery'><header role='group' class='accordion-header arrow-toggle' tabindex='0' ng-click=accordion.toggle('delivery')><h2 class='accordion-heading'>Delivery &amp; returns</h2><h3 class='accordion-subheading'>For You</h3></header><div class='accordion-section-body delivery'><div class='delivery-wrapper'><ul class='delivery-list three-col' role='group'><li  role='group'><div class='delivery-icon-wrapper'><img class='icon svg standard-delivery' src='/_ui/responsive/theme-tbs/assets/svg/icon-delivery-truck.svg' alt='Standard delivery'/></div><h4 class='delivery-header'>Standard Delivery</h4><p class='delivery-price'><!--FREE SHIPPING!* Limited Time Only. *Terms apply.-->$7.95 (FREE Shipping with $75 Purchase)</p><p class='delivery-info'>Delivery time is up to 7 business days from order date. Offer excludes orders shipped to Nunavut, Northwest Territories and the Yukon. Offer subject to change without notice.  <a href="https://www.thebodyshop.com/en-ca/policies/terms-and-conditions">Read More</a></p></li><li  role='group'><div class='delivery-icon-wrapper'><img class='icon svg express-delivery' src='/_ui/responsive/theme-tbs/assets/svg/icon-express.svg' alt='Express delivery'/></div><h4 class='delivery-header'>Express Delivery</h4><p class='delivery-price'>$15.50</p><p class='delivery-info'>Order by 11am on a work day (Monday to Friday) and we will deliver your order the next working day.</p><p class='delivery-info'>Deliveries to remote locations (including highland or island addresses)  may take up to 2 days longer.</p></li> <li  role='group'><div class='delivery-icon-wrapper'><img class='icon svg delivery-returns' src='/_ui/responsive/theme-tbs/assets/svg/icon-delivery-returns.svg' alt='Returns'/></div><h4 class='delivery-header'>Online &amp; In-store Return Policy</h4><p class='delivery-price'>&nbsp;</p><p class='delivery-info returns'>You can trust our products. We will gladly accept returns not meeting your expectations. Simply return your purchase with the receipt or original invoice to any of our locations or….(<a href="https://help.thebodyshop.com/en-ca/ca-returns-and-refunds/online-returns-policy">read more</a>).</p></li> </ul></div></div></article><header class="section-header border-top" ng-cloak>
	<h2 class="main-heading">Enrich Not Exploit</h2>
	<h3 class="sub-heading"></h3>
</header>
<div class="promo-product enrich-not-exploit" ng-cloak>
	<div class="container image">
		<picture> <!--[if IE 9]><video style="display: none;"><![endif]-->
		<source srcset="https://assets.thebodyshop.com/medias/enrich-not-exploit-640.jpg?context=content-images/hd0/h76/8796378005534/enrich-not-exploit_640.jpg" media="(min-width: 1024px)">
		<source srcset="https://assets.thebodyshop.com/medias/enrich-not-exploit-640.jpg?context=content-images/hd0/h76/8796378005534/enrich-not-exploit_640.jpg" media="(min-width: 641px) and (max-width: 1024px)">
		<source srcset="https://assets.thebodyshop.com/medias/enrich-not-exploit-640.jpg?context=content-images/hd0/h76/8796378005534/enrich-not-exploit_640.jpg" media="(max-width: 640px)">
		<!--[if IE 9]></video><![endif]--> <img src="https://assets.thebodyshop.com/medias/enrich-not-exploit-640.jpg?context=content-images/hd0/h76/8796378005534/enrich-not-exploit_640.jpg" alt="" title=""> </picture>
	</div>
	<div class="container info">
		<div class="info-inner">
			<h2 class="info-header">It's in our hands</h2>
			<p class="info-copy">Our story started with Anita Roddick's belief in something revolutionary; that business could be a force for good, and in 1976 The Body Shop was born. We've always done things differently, broken the mould, been bold, been brave.
Today, our commitment is stronger than ever; to enrich, not exploit. For us, this means enriching people as well as our planet, its biodiversity and resources. We are committed to working fairly with our farmers and suppliers and helping communities to thrive. Our products enrich, but never make false promises and are never tested on animals. We are proud to be original, irreverent and campaign for what’s right; together we can do it.</p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

			var name = cookieName + "=";
			var cookies = document.cookie.split(";");
		    for(var i=0; i<cookies.length; i++) {
		        var cookie = cookies[i];
		        while (cookie.charAt(0)==' ') cookie = cookie.substring(1);
		        if (cookie.indexOf(name) == 0) return cookie.substring(name.length,cookie.length);
		    }
		    return "";
		};

		HYB.cookies.updateCookie = function(cookieName, cookieValue, cookieMaxAge, cookiePath) {
			var expireDate = new Date();
			expireDate.setTime(expireDate.getTime() + (cookieMaxAge*1000));
			document.cookie = cookieName + "=" + cookieValue + "; expires=" + expireDate.toUTCString() + "; path=" + cookiePath;
		};

	function createMetaTag(name, content)
	{
		var dtmMetaTag = document.createElement('meta');
		dtmMetaTag.setAttribute('id', name);
		dtmMetaTag.setAttribute('name', name);
		dtmMetaTag.setAttribute('content', content);
		document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(dtmMetaTag);
	}
	
		
	
	createMetaTag('dtmDeviceType', 'Desktop');
	createMetaTag('dtmDomain', 'en-ca');
	createMetaTag('dtmCurrency', 'CAD');

	function createMetaTagForTagVariables(name, content)
	{
		var tvMetaTag = document.createElement('meta');
		tvMetaTag.setAttribute('id', name);
		tvMetaTag.setAttribute('name', name);

	<!-- Begin Monetate ExpressTag Async v6. Place at start of document head. DO NOT ALTER. -->
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var monetateT = new Date().getTime();
	    (function() {

		    var p = document.location.protocol;
		    if (p == "http:" || p == "https:") {
			    var m = document.createElement('script');
			    m.type = 'text/javascript';
			    m.async = true;
			    m.src = (p == "https:" ? "https://s" : "http://") + "b.monetate.net/js/1/a-8b4032a4/p/en-ca.thebodyshop.com/" + Math.floor((monetateT + 508205) / 3600000) + "/g";
			    var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
			    s.parentNode.insertBefore(m, s);
		    }
	    })();
	</script>

<!--  Tracking Code -->
<script type="text/javascript">
	var monetateMediatorMembers = {};
    var monetateMediator = window.monetateMediator = {};

    var searchedProducts=[];
    var atLeastOneSearch=false;


    var productDetails=null;
    var categoryName=null;


    monetateMediator.subscribe = function(eventId, functionMemeber) {

	    monetateMediatorMembers[eventId] = functionMemeber;
    }
    monetateMediator.publish = function(eventId, data) {

	    if (monetateMediatorMembers[eventId]) {
		    monetateMediatorMembers[eventId](data);
	    }
    }
    monetateMediator.subscribe('trackAddToCart', function(data) {

	    if (data.cartData) {
		    trackAddToCart_monetate(data.cartData);
	    }
    });
    monetateMediator.subscribe('searchedProducts', function(productsMonetate) {

	    if (productsMonetate) {

	        searchedProducts=productsMonetate;
	        atLeastOneSearch=true;
           	window.monetateQ.push([ "addProducts", productsMonetate ]);
		    window.monetateQ.push([ "addBreadcrumbs", breadcrumbName ]);
		    window.monetateQ.push([ "setPageType", currentPageType.toLowerCase() ]);


            if(CartProducts && CartProducts.length>0)
            {
                window.monetateQ.push([ "addCartRows", CartProducts ]);
                if(productDetails)
                {
                    window.monetateQ.push([ "addProductDetails", productDetails ]);
                }
                if(categoryName)
                {
                    window.monetateQ.push([ "addCategories", categoryName ]);
                }

            }

		    window.monetateQ.push([ "trackData" ]);
	    }
    });
    
    window.monetateQ = window.monetateQ || [];
    var path = location.pathname;
    var currentPageType = "unknown";
    if (path.indexOf("login") != -1) {
	    currentPageType = "login";
    } else if (path.indexOf("my-account") != -1) {
	    currentPageType = "account";
    } else if (path.indexOf("checkout") != -1 && path.indexOf("orderConfirmation") == -1) {
	    currentPageType = "checkout";
    } else if (path.indexOf("orderConfirmation") != -1) {
	    currentPageType = "purchase";
    }
    
    
    	currentPageType = "PRODUCT";
    
    
    window.monetateQ.push([ "setPageType", currentPageType.toLowerCase() ]);
    
    	window.monetateQ.push([ "addProductDetails", [ "p000010" ] ]);
    	var categoryName = [];
    	
    		categoryName.push("Body Scrub & Polish");
    	
   		window.monetateQ.push([ "addCategories", categoryName ]);
    
    
    var CartProducts = [];
    
    
    function trackAddToCart_monetate(cartData) {

	    if (cartData.resetCart) {
		    window.monetateQ = window.monetateQ || [];
		    window.monetateQ.push([ "addCartRows", [] ]);
		    CartProducts=[];
		    return;
	    }
	    window.monetateQ.push([ "setPageType", currentPageType.toLowerCase() ]);
	    window.monetateQ.push([ "addProductDetails", cartData.productDetails ]);
	    window.monetateQ.push([ "addCategories", cartData.categoryName ]);
	    if(atLeastOneSearch && searchedProducts)
	    {
	       window.monetateQ.push([ "addProducts", searchedProducts ]);
	    }
	    if(breadcrumbName)
	    {
	      window.monetateQ.push([ "addBreadcrumbs", breadcrumbName ]);
	    }


	    var changedItem = cartData.cartProductDetail[0];
	    var found = false;
	    if (CartProducts && CartProducts.length > 0) {
		    var i = 0;
		    for (i = 0; i < CartProducts.length; i++) {
			    if (CartProducts[i].productId == changedItem.productId) {
				    CartProducts[i].quantity = parseInt(CartProducts[i].quantity) + parseInt(changedItem.quantity);
				    found = true;
				    if (CartProducts[i].quantity == 0) {
					    CartProducts.pop(i);
				    }
				    break;
			    }
		    }
	    } else {
		    CartProducts = [];
	    }
	    if (!found) {
		    CartProducts.push(changedItem);
	    }
	    cartData.cartDetails = CartProducts;
	    window.monetateQ.push([ "addCartRows", cartData.cartDetails ]);
	    window.monetateQ.push([ "trackData" ]);

        productDetails=cartData.productDetails;
        categoryName=cartData.categoryName;
    };



    
    	var breadcrumbName = [];
    	
    		breadcrumbName.push("Body");

	<div id="newsletter-signup-form" ng-show="newsletterSignup.showForm">
		<h4 class="signup-title">
			Sign up to our newsletter</h4>
		<p class="signup-info">
			Enter your email for occasional updates and to be the first to hear about our exclusive offers and events.</p>

        </div>

			<label for="newsletter-firstname">
				First Name</label>
			<input type="text" name="name" ng-model="newsletter2.firstname" id="newsletter-firstname" ng-pattern="/^.{1,50}$/" ng-class="{'tbs-invalid': newsletterSignup.errors.firstname > ''}" required>
			<div class="error-container" ng-show="newsletter2.name.$invalid && newsletter2.name.$dirty">
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletter2.name.$error.required">
					This field is required</small>
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletter2.name.$error.pattern">
					This field is too long (maximum is 50 characters)</small>
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletterSignup.errors.firstname > ''">{{newsletterSignup.errors.firstname}}</small>
			</div>
			<label for="newsletter-lastname">
				Surname</label>
			<input type="text" name="surname" ng-model="newsletter2.lastname"  ng-pattern="/^.{1,50}$/" id="newsletter-lastname" value="" ng-class="{'tbs-invalid': newsletterSignup.errors.lastname > ''}" required>
			<div class="error-container" ng-show="newsletter2.surname.$invalid && newsletter2.surname.$dirty || newsletterSignup.errors.lastname > ''">
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletter2.surname.$error.required">
					This field is required</small>
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletter2.surname.$error.pattern">
					This field is too long (maximum is 50 characters)</small>
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletterSignup.errors.lastname > ''">{{newsletterSignup.errors.lastname}}</small>
			</div>
			<label for="newsletter-email">
				Email Address</label>

            <input type="text" name="emailaddress" ng-trim="false" ng-readonly="!newsletterSignup.isGuest"  ng-pattern="/^[_A-Za-z0-9-\+!#$%&\u0027*\/=?^_~{|}`]+(\.[_A-Za-z0-9-\+!#$%&\u0027*\/=?^_~{|}`]+)*@[A-Za-z0-9-]+(\.[A-Za-z0-9]+)*(\.[A-Za-z]{2,})$/" ng-model="newsletter2email" value="" ng-class="{'tbs-invalid': newsletterSignup.errors.email > ''}" id="newsletter-email" required>
			<div class="error-container" ng-show="newsletter2.emailaddress.$invalid && newsletter2.emailaddress.$dirty || newsletterSignup.errors.email > ''">
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletter2.emailaddress.$error.required">
					This field is required</small>
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletter2.emailaddress.$error.pattern">
					Please enter a valid email</small>
				<small class="error" ng-show="newsletterSignup.errors.email > ''">{{newsletterSignup.errors.email}}</small>
			</div>

				<div class="checkbox-wrapper">
					<input id="newsletter-terms" type="checkbox" name="termsandconditions" value="1" ng-model="newsletter2.agree" value="" ng-required="!fnewsletter.agree" required>
					<label ng-click="newsletter2.agree = !newsletter2.agree" />
					</label>
				</div>
				<label class="checkbox-signup-label" tabindex="0" for="newsletter-terms">

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {

        var articleIds = [
            
                    'product-reviews',
                    'product-QnA',
                    'section-ingredients',
                    'section-how-to-use',
                    'section-delivery',
                    'section-best-with',
                    'recommended-products'
        ];

        articleIds.forEach(function (articleId) {
            if ('' != articleId) {
                var article = document.getElementById(articleId);
                if (!article) {
                    var buttonOfTheArticle = document.getElementById("quicklink-li-" + articleId);
                    buttonOfTheArticle.parentNode.removeChild(buttonOfTheArticle);
                }
            }
        });
    });

</script>

												<h3 class="tabpanel-title" style="color:#FFFFFF">Olive</h3>
												<p class="tabpanel-text" style="color:#FFFFFF">The benefits of olive oil have been heralded since the times of Homer, undisputed until today. Olive oil restores the skins smoothness, has anti-aging properties and protects against ultraviolet light. The vitamins and antioxidants in olive oil help to soothe, relieve and repair dry, chapped, itchy skin by rebuilding the skin's moisture. Our organic olive oil is of the finest quality, from the rolling hills of San Mauro Cilento. Get the fresh, healthy glow of olive skin, straight from Italy.</p>

<article id="section-how-to-use" class="accordion-section" tbs-product-accordion section="howtouse">
		<header class="accordion-header how-to-use arrow-toggle" tabindex="0" aria-label="{{accordion.isMobile ? 'Click to view How to use' : ''}}" ng-click="accordion.toggle('howtouse')">
			<h2 class="accordion-heading">How To Use</h2>
			<h3 class="accordion-subheading">Make The Most Of It</h3>
		</header>
		<div class="accordion-section-body">
			<div class="how-to-use-wrapper">
				<div class="right-wrapper">
							<p class="how-to-use-text">Massage gently onto damp or wet skin, then rinse thoroughly.</p>
						</div>
					</div>
		</div>
	</article>
<article class='accordion-section' id='section-delivery' tbs-product-accordion section='delivery'><header role='group' class='accordion-header arrow-toggle' tabindex='0' ng-click=accordion.toggle('delivery')><h2 class='accordion-heading'>Delivery &amp; returns</h2><h3 class='accordion-subheading'>For You</h3></header><div class='accordion-section-body delivery'><div class='delivery-wrapper'><ul class='delivery-list three-col' role='group'><li  role='group'><div class='delivery-icon-wrapper'><img class='icon svg standard-delivery' src='/_ui/responsive/theme-tbs/assets/svg/icon-delivery-truck.svg' alt='Standard delivery'/></div><h4 class='delivery-header'>Standard Delivery</h4><p class='delivery-price'><!--FREE SHIPPING!* Limited Time Only. *Terms apply.-->$7.95 (FREE Shipping with $75 Purchase)</p><p class='delivery-info'>Delivery time is up to 7 business days from order date. Offer excludes orders shipped to Nunavut, Northwest Territories and the Yukon. Offer subject to change without notice.  <a href="https://www.thebodyshop.com/en-ca/policies/terms-and-conditions">Read More</a></p></li><li  role='group'><div class='delivery-icon-wrapper'><img class='icon svg express-delivery' src='/_ui/responsive/theme-tbs/assets/svg/icon-express.svg' alt='Express delivery'/></div><h4 class='delivery-header'>Express Delivery</h4><p class='delivery-price'>$15.50</p><p class='delivery-info'>Order by 11am on a work day (Monday to Friday) and we will deliver your order the next working day.</p><p class='delivery-info'>Deliveries to remote locations (including highland or island addresses)  may take up to 2 days longer.</p></li> <li  role='group'><div class='delivery-icon-wrapper'><img class='icon svg delivery-returns' src='/_ui/responsive/theme-tbs/assets/svg/icon-delivery-returns.svg' alt='Returns'/></div><h4 class='delivery-header'>Online &amp; In-store Return Policy</h4><p class='delivery-price'>&nbsp;</p><p class='delivery-info returns'>You can trust our products. We will gladly accept returns not meeting your expectations. Simply return your purchase with the receipt or original invoice to any of our locations or….(<a href="https://help.thebodyshop.com/en-ca/ca-returns-and-refunds/online-returns-policy">read more</a>).</p></li> </ul></div></div></article><header class="section-header border-top" ng-cloak>
	<h2 class="main-heading">Enrich Not Exploit</h2>
	<h3 class="sub-heading"></h3>
</header>
<div class="promo-product enrich-not-exploit" ng-cloak>
	<div class="container image">
		<picture> <!--[if IE 9]><video style="display: none;"><![endif]-->
		<source srcset="https://assets.thebodyshop.com/medias/enrich-not-exploit-640.jpg?context=content-images/hd0/h76/8796378005534/enrich-not-exploit_640.jpg" media="(min-width: 1024px)">
		<source srcset="https://assets.thebodyshop.com/medias/enrich-not-exploit-640.jpg?context=content-images/hd0/h76/8796378005534/enrich-not-exploit_640.jpg" media="(min-width: 641px) and (max-width: 1024px)">
		<source srcset="https://assets.thebodyshop.com/medias/enrich-not-exploit-640.jpg?context=content-images/hd0/h76/8796378005534/enrich-not-exploit_640.jpg" media="(max-width: 640px)">
		<!--[if IE 9]></video><![endif]--> <img src="https://assets.thebodyshop.com/medias/enrich-not-exploit-640.jpg?context=content-images/hd0/h76/8796378005534/enrich-not-exploit_640.jpg" alt="" title=""> </picture>
	</div>
	<div class="container info">
		<div class="info-inner">
			<h2 class="info-header">It's in our hands</h2>
			<p class="info-copy">Our story started with Anita Roddick's belief in something revolutionary; that business could be a force for good, and in 1976 The Body Shop was born. We've always done things differently, broken the mould, been bold, been brave.
Today, our commitment is stronger than ever; to enrich, not exploit. For us, this means enriching people as well as our planet, its biodiversity and resources. We are committed to working fairly with our farmers and suppliers and helping communities to thrive. Our products enrich, but never make false promises and are never tested on animals. We are proud to be original, irreverent and campaign for what’s right; together we can do it.</p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
<a ng-cloak href="/en-ca/commitment/manifesto" class="btn-primary discover-more">Discover More</a></div>
		
	</div>

		HYB.cookies = {};
		HYB.cookies.getCookieValue = function(cookieName) {
			var name = cookieName + "=";
			var cookies = document.cookie.split(";");
		    for(var i=0; i<cookies.length; i++) {
		        var cookie = cookies[i];
		        while (cookie.charAt(0)==' ') cookie = cookie.substring(1);
		        if (cookie.indexOf(name) == 0) return cookie.substring(name.length,cookie.length);
		    }
		    return "";
		};

		HYB.cookies.updateCookie = function(cookieName, cookieValue, cookieMaxAge, cookiePath) {
			var expireDate = new Date();
			expireDate.setTime(expireDate.getTime() + (cookieMaxAge*1000));
			document.cookie = cookieName + "=" + cookieValue + "; expires=" + expireDate.toUTCString() + "; path=" + cookiePath;
		};
	/*]]>*/
</script>
